data.description: IT Business Applications Intern Location – hybrid: Palo Alto, CA  Position Overview: The IT Business Applications Intern will work closely with our Enterprise Technology team to assist in the maintenance, development, and optimization of our CRM platform. This role provides an excellent opportunity to gain hands-on experience and learn about CRM administration, development, and best practices. What you’ll do: Assist with the maintenance and configuration of the CRM platform. Collaborate on developing and debugging Apex code to create customized solutions. Work alongside the team to create and customize CRM objects, workflows, page layouts, fields, and applications. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather and document requirements for CRM enhancements. Participate in testing new CRM features, updates, and custom Apex solutions. Learn and adhere to CRM best practices, including best practices in Apex coding. Participate in team meetings, offering insights and suggestions for process improvements. What you’ll need: Currently pursuing degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Business Administration, or a related field. Basic understanding of CRM systems Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Ability to work independently and in a team-oriented environment. Eagerness to learn, adaptable, and open to feedback. What you’ll Gain Hands-on experience working with CRM platforms. Opportunity to collaborate with experienced CRM professionals. What to Expect:  Our Summer 2026 Internship Program begins June 1, 2026, and is projected to end August 7, 2026.  Your professional growth and development will be supported throughout the internship program via project work related to your academic and professional interests, mentorship, and engaging events with other interns and company leadership.  Our internship is hybrid, and interns will be expected in the office at least 3 days a week to get the full experience of the Intapp culture and networking opportunities. Please visit Intapp Summer Internship to hear from our former interns about their internship experiences and check out Working at Intapp to learn more about what we value and why Intapp is a wonderful place to start your career!  Intapp provides equal employment opportunities to all qualified applicants and will make hiring decisions without regard to race, color, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, religion, national origin or ancestry, age, disability, marital status, pregnancy, protected veteran status, protected genetic information, political affiliation, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local laws. Please note: Intapp will not hire through text message, social media, or email alone. We will never extend a job offer unless you have been contacted directly by an Intapp recruiter and have participated in the interview process which will generally consist of 3 or more virtual or in person meetings. Please note that Intapp only uses company email addresses, which contain “@intapp.com” or “@dealcloud.com” to communicate with candidates via email. Intapp will never ask for financial information of any kind or for any payment during the job application process. We post all legitimate job openings on the Intapp Career Site at https://www.intapp.com/working-at-intapp/. If you believe you were a victim of such a scam, you may contact your local authorities. Intapp is not responsible for any claims, losses, damages, or expenses resulting from scammers.
requirements: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather and document requirements for CRM enhancements.
Currently pursuing degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Business Administration, or a related field.
responsibilities: Collaborate on developing and debugging Apex code to create customized solutions.
Opportunity to collaborate with experienced CRM professionals.

Your professional growth and development will be supported throughout the internship program via project work related to your academic and professional interests, mentorship, and engaging events with other interns and company leadership.
Our internship is hybrid, and interns will be expected in the office at least 3 days a week to get the full experience of the Intapp culture and networking opportunities.
